page.title: 02QUINTON HOUSE
page.content: Quinton House School stands in over twenty acres of parkland,roughly a mile from the town centre.Parts of the buildings orriginate from the{ {fifteenth century.}There are three schools in all,lower,middle and upper.Pupils have to be over eight years old to board there,you are allowed to board for four days a week. In the summer term there is an open day in which parents can see the work done during the year. This school is private meaning parents would have to pay for every term spent there. { The senior classrooms are old {stable blocks.} Girls stay on to take Oxford G.C.E examinations.
